participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Sociable and laid-back, enjoys lighthearted conversations and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I like to spend my money on cars. I have never had a steady relationship. I watch too much TV in my spare time. I go to the gym most days just to socialize. I work from home.

participant_2.name: Sofia Rodriguez
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, with a love for arts and cooking, often uses humor to lighten tough situations.
participant_2.background: I am a descendant of Christopher Columbus. I am an art major in college. I love to cook paella. I have a weakness for fish and chips. I visit Europe twice a year.
